reviewText: Nice selection of episodes from the 4th series of Ojarumaru and enjoyable bonus features. The only flaw I have with the DVD is the video quality. It's watchable, but not great. However, I give it some slack since it was released during the time when DVD was still a pretty new format. The vast majority of the 4th series is very rare nowadays, so I highly recommend the DVD if you're either very interested in checking out the 4th series for the first time or want to relive childhood memories of watching it on NHK E-Tele.
